document_data.name: Elaesse Loridiel
document_data.mainbody: '''Elaesse Loridiel''' was an [[Elf|elven]] traveler in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] who briefly stayed in [[Thentia]], with disastrous results.
document_data.Relationships: Although she was initially very fond of the [[bard]] [[Mendryll Belarod]], their relationship quickly turned sour after he helped cause her [[unicorn]] companion to abandon her.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1367}}, she was traveling the [[Moonsea]] and stayed a time in Thentia. She stabled her faithful unicorn steed at [[Angrym's Livery]], and while at [[The Inlet]], spent a night with fellow traveler Mendryll Belarod. The following morning she was distraught to discover that her unicorn companion had deserted her and disappeared.
